summary.span: 提供使用者介面，可讓使用者變更他們的網站密碼。

span.span: Provides a user interface that enable users to change their Web site password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#Introduction) - [傳送電子郵件訊息Sending Email Messages](#sending_email_messages) - [檢視Views](#views) - [樣式和範本Styles and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [驗證群組Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings) - [存取索引鍵和索引標籤索引Access Keys and Tab Indexes](#access_keys_and_tab_indexes) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [在 Page_Load 和 Page_Init 期間存取控制項Accessing Controls During Page_Load and Page_Init](#accessing_controls_during_page_load_and_page_init) - [套用 CSS 樣式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [宣告式語法 #Declarative Syntax#](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用頁面，即可讓網站使用者變更的密碼，他們用以登入您的網站上的控制項。Use the control on a page to enable your Web site users to change the passwords they use to log on to your Web site. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 中所提供的登入控制項組，請參閱[ASP.NET 登入控制項概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d(v=vs.100))再繼續進行。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, read [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 如需登入控制項及成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱 < [ 使用的成員資格管理使用者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). > [!IMPORTANT] > 透過 HTTP 傳輸密碼是潛在的安全性威脅。Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat. HTTP 傳輸可以是檢視或遭惡意使用者。HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users. 為了提高安全性，使用登入控制項時，您應該使用 HTTPS 通訊協定使用安全通訊端層 (SSL) 加密，確保在回傳期間，無法讀取使用者的密碼。To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護登入控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 控制項使用中定義的成員資格提供者屬性來變更儲存在網站上的成員資格提供者資料存放區中的密碼。The control uses the membership provider defined in the property to change the password stored in the membership provider data store for the Web site. 如果您沒有指派成員資格提供者控制項使用 Web.config 檔案區段中定義的預設成員資格提供者。If you do not assign a membership provider, the control uses the default membership provider defined in the section of the Web.config file. 控制項可讓使用者執行下列動作：The control enables users to perform the following actions: - 如果它們登入，請變更其密碼。Change their password if they are logged on. - 變更其密碼，如果它們不登入，只要此頁面包含控制項可讓匿名存取，屬性是`true`。Change their password if they are not logged on, as long as the page that contains the control allows anonymous access and the property is `true`. - 即使不同的使用者身分登入，請變更使用者帳戶的密碼。Change the password for a user account, even if they are logged on as a different user. 這需要屬性是`true`。This requires the property to be `true`. 設定屬性設`true`顯示使用者名稱 文字方塊中，可讓使用者輸入使用者名稱。Setting the property to `true` displays the User Name text box, which allows the user to type in a user name. 如果使用者登入，控制項填入登入使用者的名稱。If the user is logged on, the control is populated with the name of the logged-on user. 指定的使用者名稱的密碼變更之後，使用者被登入的帳戶相關聯變更的密碼，即使使用者已無法登入該帳戶先前。After the password for the given user name is changed, the user is logged on to the account associated with the changed password, even if the user was not logged on to that account previously. > [!IMPORTANT] > 接受使用者輸入，潛在的安全性威脅。Accepting user input is a potential security threat. 惡意使用者可以傳送資料，要公開 （expose） 的弱點或執行程式會嘗試產生的密碼。Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords. 為了提高安全性，使用使用者輸入時，您應該使用您的控制項的驗證功能，並保護任何已設定的資料提供者為您的控制項。To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護登入控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)，[的 Web 應用程式的基本安全性作法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)，並[保護的成員資格](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad), and [Securing Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7). ## 傳送電子郵件訊息Sending Email Messages 控制項可以設定為使用新密碼傳送給使用者的電子郵件服務。The control can be configured to use email services to send the new password to the user. 從 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項的任何傳送給使用者的電子郵件訊息，您必須在 Web.config 檔案中設定電子郵件伺服器應用程式。To send email messages to users from any of ASP.NET Web server controls, you must configure an email server in the Web.config file for your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 如何： 安裝和設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For more information, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 電子郵件訊息會設定為使用類別。Email messages are configured using the class. 您必須設定屬性，指示 ASP.NET 傳送電子郵件。You must set the property to instruct ASP.NET to send email. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可由 「 探查 」 應用程式的特殊網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，使用 緩和措施中所述[保護登入控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). > [!NOTE] > 不保證會接收使用者，或檢視電子郵件訊息。It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an email message. 若要確認使用者已收到的訊息，提供可讓使用者確認收到通知的電子郵件訊息中的確認連結。To verify that a user has received a message, provide a confirmation link in the email message that lets the user confirm that the notification was received. ## 檢視Views 控制項有兩個狀態或檢視表：The control has two states, or views: - 變更密碼 檢視會要求目前的密碼，並要求使用者輸入新密碼兩次進行確認。Change Password view Requests the current password, and requires the user to type the new password twice for confirmation. 如果您允許使用者不登入若要變更其密碼，設定屬性，以`true`顯示變更密碼 檢視中的控制項。If you allow users who are not logged on to change their passwords, set the property to `true` to display the control in Change Password view. 控制項可讓使用者提供他們的已註冊的使用者名稱。The control allows the user to provide their registered user name. 如果變更的密碼時，卻發生錯誤，錯誤訊息會顯示在 [變更密碼] 檢視中，讓使用者再試一次。If there is an error when changing the password, an error message is displayed in the Change Password view, allowing the user to try again. - [成功] 檢視提供確認密碼已變更。Success view Provides confirmation that the password has been changed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 變更密碼，並繼續 和 取消 功能會附加至任何具有正確的命令名稱，不論何種檢視放置按鈕的按鈕。The functionality for changing passwords and for continue and cancel is attached to any button that has the correct command name, regardless of which view the button is placed on. 例如，具有值的按鈕`commandname=changepassword`在成功 檢視會嘗試變更密碼，並導致例外狀況。For example, a button with the value `commandname=changepassword` in the Success view will attempt to change the password and result in an exception. ## 樣式和範本Styles and Templates 您可以使用一組廣泛的樣式屬性來自訂外觀控制項。You can use an extensive set of style properties to customize the appearance of the control. 或者，您可以自訂將範本套用至兩個檢視如果您需要完成的外觀控制控制項。Alternatively, you can apply custom templates to the two views if you need complete control over the appearance of the control. 如果您定義檢視的範本屬性會套用。If you define a template for a view, the properties are applied. 如需檢視範本中，您必須設定控制項的清單，請參閱 < 和屬性。For a list of the controls that you must set in the view templates, see the and properties. 控制會檢查在範本中的內容，並擲回例外狀況，如果找不到，名稱不正確，或屬於錯誤類型的所需的控制項。The control examines the content in the template and throws an exception if a required control is not found, is not named correctly, or is of the wrong type. 比方說，如果您使用範本和設定的內容屬性，以`true`，則將會擲回例外狀況，如果或其他一些控制項找不到使用者名稱。For example, if you use the content in the template and set the property to `true`, the will throw an exception if a or some other control is not found for the user name. 下表列出控制項樣式屬性，並描述它們所影響的 UI 項目。The following table lists the control style properties and describes which UI element they affect. 如需每個樣式套用至屬性的清單，請參閱個別的樣式屬性。For a list of the properties to which each style applies, see the individual style property. | 樣式屬性 style property|UI 項目UI element| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------| ||在 [變更密碼] 檢視上的 [取消] 按鈕。Cancel button on the Change Password view.| ||變更 [變更密碼] 檢視中的 [密碼] 按鈕。Change Password button on the Change Password view.| ||在 [成功] 檢視上 [繼續] 按鈕。Continue button on the Success view.| ||對使用者顯示的錯誤文字。Error text displayed to the user.| ||其他頁面的超連結。Hyperlinks to other pages.| ||說明如何使用的頁面上的指示文字控制項。Instructional text on the page that describes how to use the control.| ||所有輸入欄位，例如文字方塊的標籤。Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| ||為網站提供可接受的密碼的提示。Hints for providing an acceptable password for the Web site.| ||已成功變更密碼時，向使用者顯示的文字。Text displayed to the user when the password has been successfully changed.| ||文字項目輸入的欄位。Text entry input fields.| ||[變更密碼] 和 [成功] 檢視的標題。Titles for the Change Password and Success views.| ## 套用 CSS 樣式Applying CSS Styles 控制項可讓您在標記中指定 CSS 樣式規則。The control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup. 如果您使用範本來自訂外觀控制項，您可以在範本標記中指定的 CSS 樣式。If you use templates to customize the appearance of the control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates. 在此情況下，額外的外部資料表不是必要的。In that case, no extra outer table is required. 您可以防止資料表，藉由設定轉譯屬性設`false`。You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the property to `false`. ## 驗證群組Validation Groupings 控制項，讓其他欄位相同的頁面上，使用的驗證群組分別驗證控制項。The control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the control can be validated separately. 根據預設，屬性控制項當做驗證群組的名稱。By default, the property of the control is used as the name of the validation group. 例如，識別碼的控制項`"ChangePassword1"`將使用的驗證群組名稱`ChangePassword1`以及。For example, a control with the ID `"ChangePassword1"` will use a validation group name of `ChangePassword1` as well. 若要設定的驗證群組控制項的一部分，您必須使用控制項，建立範本，然後變更 驗證群組名稱。To set the validation group that the control is part of, you must create a template with the control, and then change the validation group name. 若要顯示錯誤訊息 如果使用者離開空白控制項，新增控制項加入網頁。To show error messages if a user leaves a control empty, add a control to the page. 設定的屬性若要控制屬性控制項。Set the property of the control to the property of the control. ## 存取索引鍵和索引標籤索引Access Keys and Tab Indexes 如需有關如何使用資訊屬性和屬性控制項，請參閱[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to use the property and the property of a control, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合協助工具標準的標記資訊，請參閱[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 在 Page_Load 和 Page_Init 期間存取控制項Accessing Controls During Page_Load and Page_Init 控制屬性表示的文字方塊中，例如和，網頁生命週期的所有階段期間都可存取。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as and , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 特別是，Page_Init 和 Page_Load 階段期間，這些屬性具有相同的值時所擁有呈現控制項。In particular, during the Page_Init and Page_Load phases, these properties have the same value they had when the control was rendered. 如果使用者變更的值屬性，藉由修改 文字方塊中，新的值將可以取得已變更的事件引發時，它在 Page_Load 階段之後，就會發生。If the user changes the value of the property by modifying the text box, the new value will be available when the changed event is raised, which occurs after the Page_Load phase. 因此，如果您設定的值Page_Init 階段或 Page_Load 階段中的屬性，並提供自訂的處理常式，如事件、 使用者中進行任何變更文字方塊會覆寫 Page_Init 中設定的值或Page_Load 階段。Therefore, if you set the value of the property in the Page_Init phase or Page_Load phase and provide a custom handler for a event, any change that the user makes in the text box overrides the value set in the Page_Init or Page_Load phase. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性來定義規則運算式會檢查密碼，以確保它們符合下列準則：The following code example shows how to set the property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria: - 已超過六個字元。Are greater than six characters. - 包含至少一個數字。Contain at least one digit. - 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 中所包含的密碼需求屬性會顯示給使用者。The password requirements contained in the property are displayed to the user. 如果使用者輸入的密碼不符合的需求屬性，而中所包含的文字屬性會顯示給使用者。If the password entered by the user does not meet the requirements of the property, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果未輸入新密碼，文字就會包含在屬性會顯示給使用者。If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. > [!NOTE] > 新密碼必須符合所設定的最低需求中， ，和屬性。The new password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密碼不符合這些需求，就會引發事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. [!code-aspx-csharp[ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex/CS/changepasswordpasswordregexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex/VB/changepasswordpasswordregexvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性來定義規則運算式會檢查密碼，以確保它們符合下列準則：The following code example shows how to set the property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria: - 已超過六個字元。Are greater than six characters. - 包含至少一個數字。Contain at least one digit. - 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 中所包含的密碼需求屬性會顯示給使用者。The password requirements contained in the property are displayed to the user. 如果使用者輸入的密碼不符合準則，文字就會包含在屬性會顯示給使用者。If the password entered by the user does not meet the criteria, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果未輸入新密碼，文字就會包含在屬性會顯示給使用者。If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. > [!NOTE] > 新密碼必須符合所設定的最低需求中， ，和屬性。The new password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密碼不符合這些需求，就會引發事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. summary.span: 表示 [取消] 按鈕的 值。

span.span: Represents the value of the Cancel button.

summary.span: 此欄位為唯讀。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用欄位來表示`CommandName`[取消] 按鈕的值。Use the field to represent the `CommandName` value of the Cancel button. 設定模擬功能的 [取消] 按鈕的任何按鈕時，這是很有用控制項。This is useful when configuring any button to mimic the functionality of the Cancel button of the control. 若要將取消功能指派給任何中所包含的控制項控制項，並設定屬性中包含字串的按鈕欄位。To assign cancel functionality to any control contained in the control, set the property of the button to the string that is contained in the field. [取消] 按鈕可以出現在 ChangePassword 範本或 [成功] 範本。The Cancel button can appear on the ChangePassword template or the Success template. 按一下 [取消] 按鈕，以成功範本並不會復原變更密碼;它將會清除文字方塊。Clicking the Cancel button on the Success template will not undo the password change; it will clear the text boxes. 若要自訂功能加入 [取消] 按鈕，建立的事件處理常式事件。To add custom functionality to the Cancel button, create an event handler for the event.

summary.span: 取得定義 控制項上 [取消] 按鈕外觀之 屬性集合的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of the Cancel button on the control.

value.span: 物件，定義 [取消] 按鈕的外觀。

span.span: A object that defines the appearance of the Cancel button.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定屬性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|[取消] 按鈕的色彩。The color of the Cancel button. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|[取消] 按鈕周圍的框線色彩。The color of the border around the Cancel button. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|[取消] 按鈕周圍的框線樣式。The style of the border around the Cancel button. 樣式可`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 預設值為 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`設定大於 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` setting is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|[取消] 按鈕周圍的框線寬度。The width of the border around the Cancel button.| |`CssClass`|用來呈現 [取消] 按鈕階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Cancel button. 如果未指定其他設定，它們會覆寫樣式表設定。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗體顯示 [取消] 按鈕的文字。`true` to display the Cancel button text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜體字型顯示 [取消] 按鈕的文字。`true` to display the Cancel button text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字型名稱。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要顯示 [取消] 按鈕文字上方有線條。`true` to display the Cancel button text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|中為 [取消] 按鈕的文字大小物件。The size of the text in the Cancel button as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要線時，顯示 [取消] 按鈕的文字。`true` to display the Cancel button text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要顯示 [取消] 按鈕文字與底線。`true` to display the Cancel button text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|在 [取消] 按鈕的文字色彩。The color of the text in the Cancel button. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.|

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler ChangedPassword;
.event class System.EventHandler ChangedPassword
Public Custom Event ChangedPassword As EventHandler
public: event EventHandler ^ ChangedPassword;
member this.ChangedPassword : EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於使用者帳戶的密碼變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the password is changed for a user account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的成員資格提供者會變更密碼之後，會引發事件屬性。The event is raised after the password is changed by the membership provider specified in the property. 之後引發事件時，會發生下列情況：After the event is raised, the following occurs: - 如果屬性設定，控制項嘗試傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者。If the property is set, the control attempts to send an email message to the user. - 使用者可以導向至指定的網站屬性或 [控制項] 範本中指定屬性會顯示。The user is either redirected to the Web site specified in the property or the control template specified in the property is displayed. 新的授權權杖，使用者會在之後設定事件之前事件。The new authorization token for the user is set after the event but before the event. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 表示 [變更密碼] 按鈕的 值。

span.span: Represents the value of the Change Password button.

summary.span: 此欄位為唯讀。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用欄位來表示`CommandName`變更密碼 按鈕的值。Use the field to represent the `CommandName` value of the Change Password button. 設定模擬功能的 [變更密碼] 按鈕的任何按鈕時，這是很有用控制項。This is useful when configuring any button to mimic the functionality of the Change Password button of the control. 變更密碼 按鈕完成的最後一個步驟控制項。The Change Password button completes the last step in the control. 若要將變更密碼功能指派給任何中所包含的控制項控制項，並設定屬性中包含字串的按鈕欄位。To assign change-password functionality to any control contained in the control, set the property of the button to the string that is contained in the field. 變更密碼 按鈕可以出現在 ChangePassword 範本或 成功 範本。The Change Password button can appear on the ChangePassword template or the Success template. 在這兩種情況下，按一下 [變更密碼] 按鈕會呼叫成員資格提供者，來變更密碼。In both cases, clicking the Change Password button calls the membership provider to change the password. 若要變更密碼 按鈕來新增自訂功能，建立事件處理常式事件。To add custom functionality to the Change Password button, create an event handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定屬性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|[變更密碼] 按鈕的色彩。The color of the Change Password button. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|變更密碼 按鈕周圍的框線色彩。The color of the border around the Change Password button. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|變更密碼 按鈕周圍的框線樣式。The style of the border around the Change Password button. 樣式可`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 預設值為 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`值大於 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|變更密碼 按鈕周圍的框線寬度。The width of the border around the Change Password button.| |`CssClass`|用來呈現變更密碼 按鈕階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Change Password button. 如果未指定其他設定，它們會覆寫樣式表設定。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗體顯示 [變更密碼] 按鈕的文字。`true` to display the Change Password button text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜體字型顯示 [變更密碼] 按鈕的文字。`true` to display the Change Password button text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字型名稱。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要顯示 [變更密碼] 按鈕文字上方有線條。`true` to display the Change Password button text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|中為 [變更密碼] 按鈕的文字大小物件。The size of the text in the Change Password button as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要變更密碼 按鈕文字線顯示。`true` to display the Change Password button text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要顯示 [變更密碼] 按鈕文字與底線。`true` to display the Change Password button text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|在 [變更密碼] 按鈕的文字色彩。The color of the text in the Change Password button. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|A表示 [變更密碼] 按鈕的高度。A that represents the height of the Change Password button.| |`Width`|A表示 [變更密碼] 按鈕的寬度。A that represents the width of the Change Password button.|

summary.span: 發生於變更使用者帳戶密碼遭遇錯誤時。

span.span: Occurs when there is an error changing the password for the user account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的成員資格提供者時，會引發事件屬性而發生錯誤時嘗試變更使用者帳戶的密碼。The event is raised when the membership provider specified in the property encounters an error while attempting to change the password for a user account. 如果使用者輸入目前密碼不正確或無效的新密碼，也可能會發生。This can occur if the user enters an incorrect current password or an invalid new password. 指定物件不會指出失敗的原因變更密碼，只有未變更密碼。The specified object does not indicate the reason why changing the password failed, only that the password was not changed. 使用密碼未變更時執行自訂動作的事件。Use the event to perform custom actions when the password is not changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成員資格提供者會拒絕使用者所輸入的密碼時，系統會顯示屬性。The property is displayed when the membership provider rejects the password entered by the user. 物件不會傳回拒絕新的密碼的原因。The object does not return a reason for rejecting the new password. 使用事件，以檢查已拒絕的密碼，如果您想要對使用者提供有關如何輸入 （例如，若要指出，必須提供強式密碼） 的可接受密碼的提示。Use the event to examine the rejected password if you want to provide the user with a tip on how to enter an acceptable password (for example, to indicate that a strong password must be provided). 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定所使用的物件控制項。The property specifies the object used by the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [How To： 建立 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項範本動態](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4)。For more information, see [How To: Create ASP.NET Web Server Control Templates Dynamically](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4). 範本是一份 HTML 項目和控制項的版面配置控制項的特定部分所組成。A template is a set of HTML elements and controls that make up the layout for a particular portion of a control. 樣板與樣式不同：Templates differ from styles: - 範本會定義控制項的區段的內容。Templates define the content of a section of a control. - 樣式會指定在控制項中項目的外觀。Styles specify the appearance of elements in the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Web 伺服器控制項樣板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae)並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see [Web Server Controls Templates](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae) and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 下表列出範本與對應的控制項檢視所支援控制項。The following table lists the templates and the corresponding control view that are supported by the control. |範本名稱Template name|控制項檢視Control view| |-------------------|------------------| ||變更密碼Change Password| ||成功Success| 您也可以建立或修改在.aspx 檔案中的控制項範本。You can also create or modify the template for a control in your .aspx file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建立 ASP.NET Web 控制項範本以宣告方式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4977e1d5-c53a-4908-83be-bba0ad37357a)並[How To： 建立 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項範本動態](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4)。For more information, see [How to: Create ASP.NET Web Control Templates Declaratively](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4977e1d5-c53a-4908-83be-bba0ad37357a) and [How To: Create ASP.NET Web Server Control Templates Dynamically](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4). 這些主題中的程序不需要您設定屬性。The procedures in those topics do not require you to configure the property. 如果您設定範本下, 表列出必要和選擇性的控制項範本。If you do configure the template, the following table lists the required and optional controls for the template. |控制項 IDControl ID|控制項類型Control type|必要/選用Required/optional| |----------------|------------------|------------------------| |`Cancel`|任何控制項，會導致事件反昇 （傳遞伺服器控制階層架構中向上事件），這類， ，和控制項。Any control that causes event bubbling (passing the event up the server control hierarchy), such as the , , and controls. 按鈕命令名稱必須設定為控制項 id。The button command name must be set to the control ID.|OptionalOptional| |`ChangePassword`|任何控制項，會導致事件反昇 （傳遞伺服器控制階層架構中向上事件），這類， ，和控制項。Any control that causes event bubbling (passing the event up the server control hierarchy), such as the , , and controls. 按鈕命令名稱必須設定為控制項 id。The button command name must be set to the control ID.|OptionalOptional| |`ConfirmNewPassword`|支援任何型別介面，例如類別。Any type that supports the interface, such as the class.|OptionalOptional| |`Continue`|任何控制項，會導致事件反昇 （傳遞伺服器控制階層架構中向上事件），這類， ，和控制項。Any control summary.span: 發生於成員資格提供者變更使用者帳戶密碼之前。

span.span: Occurs before the password for a user account is changed by the membership provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的成員資格提供者之前，就會引發事件屬性稱為變更使用者帳戶的密碼。The event is raised before the membership provider specified in the property is called to change the password for a user account. 使用執行之前變更密碼，例如檢查新的密碼，以確保其所需的任何處理的事件就不會在清單中的一般密碼。Use the event to perform any processing that is necessary before changing the password, such as checking the new password to make sure it is not in a list of common passwords. 新的授權權杖，使用者會在之後設定事件之前事件。The new authorization token for the user is set after the event but before the event. 可以取消事件，藉由設定屬性物件`true`如果事件處理常式可讓您決定不應該呼叫成員資格提供者。The event can be canceled by setting the property of the object to `true` if the event handler determines that the membership provider should not be called. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁，會使用控制項，並包含的處理常式事件，名為`ChangingPassword`。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. 中的事件處理常式的程式碼會比較儲存在舊密碼屬性，以新的密碼儲存在。The code in the event handler compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果兩個密碼都相同，變更密碼 」 就會失敗。If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails. 控制集屬性設`true`若要讓使用者輸入其使用者名稱。The control sets the property to `true` to enable users to enter their user name. 這表示使用者沒有檢視該頁面登入。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 在程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知其名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作簡單的表單驗證](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得使用者輸入的重複密碼。

span.span: Gets the duplicate password entered by the user.

value.span: 使用者輸入的重複新密碼字串。

span.span: The duplicate new password string entered by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含使用者所輸入的重複新密碼。The property contains the duplicate new password entered by the user. 您可以使用屬性來定義新的密碼的需求。You can use the property to define the requirements for the new password. 這個規則運算式用來強制執行用戶端上的密碼規則。This regular expression is used to enforce password rules on the client side. 無關，可以在資料存放區層級設定，並在伺服器端上強制執行密碼強制執行。The is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level and enforced on the server side. 密碼必須符合所設定的最低需求中， ，和屬性。The password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密碼不符合這些需求，就會引發事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. > [!IMPORTANT] > 透過 HTTP 傳輸密碼是潛在的安全性威脅。Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat. HTTP 傳輸可以是檢視或遭惡意使用者。HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users. 為了提高安全性，使用登入控制項時，您應該使用 HTTPS 通訊協定使用安全通訊端層 (SSL) 加密，確保在回傳期間，無法讀取使用者的密碼。To improve security when using login controls, you should use the HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護登入控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項需要使用者輸入新密碼兩次因為在使用者輸入其時在螢幕上遮罩密碼字元。The control requires the user to enter the new password twice because the password characters are masked on the screen as the user types them. 如果使用者未輸入相同的密碼在新的密碼 文字方塊中，確認新密碼 文字方塊中中的訊息屬性會顯示。If the user does not enter the same password in both the New Password text box and the Confirm New Password text box, the message in the property is displayed. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用欄位來表示`CommandName`[繼續] 按鈕的值。Use the field to represent the `CommandName` value of the Continue button. 設定模擬功能的 [繼續] 按鈕的任何按鈕時，這是很有用控制項。This is useful when configuring any button to mimic the functionality of the Continue button of the control. 若要指派繼續任何功能中所包含的控制項控制項，並設定屬性中包含字串的按鈕欄位。To assign continue functionality to any control contained in the control, set the property of the button to the string that is contained in the field. [繼續] 按鈕可以出現在 ChangePassword 範本或 [成功] 範本。The Continue button can appear on the ChangePassword template or the Success template. 按一下 [繼續] 按鈕將使用者導向至儲存在 URL屬性。Clicking the Continue button redirects the user to the URL stored in the property. 若要自訂功能加入 [繼續] 按鈕，建立的事件處理常式事件。To add custom functionality to the Continue button, create an event handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定屬性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|[繼續] 按鈕的色彩。The color of the Continue button. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|[繼續] 按鈕周圍的框線色彩。The color of the border around the Continue button. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|[繼續] 按鈕周圍的框線樣式。The style of the border around the Continue button. 樣式可`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 預設值為 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`值大於 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|[繼續] 按鈕周圍的框線寬度。The width of the border around the Continue button.| |`CssClass`|用來呈現 [繼續] 按鈕階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Continue button. 如果未指定其他設定，它們會覆寫樣式表設定。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗體顯示 [繼續] 按鈕文字。`true` to display the Continue button text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜體字型顯示 [繼續] 按鈕文字。`true` to display the Continue button text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字型名稱。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要顯示有一條線，其上方的 [繼續] 按鈕文字。`true` to display the Continue button text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|中為 [繼續] 按鈕的文字大小物件。The size of the text in the Continue button as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要線時，顯示 [繼續] 按鈕文字。`true` to display the Continue button text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要顯示 [繼續] 按鈕文字與底線。`true` to display the Continue button text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|在 [繼續] 按鈕的文字色彩。The color of the text in the Continue button. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|A表示 [繼續] 按鈕的高度。A that represents the height of the Continue button.| |`Width`|A表示 [繼續] 按鈕的寬度。A that represents the width of the Continue button.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含後已成功變更其密碼的使用者會看到該網頁的 URL。The property contains the URL of the Web page that users will see after successfully changing their password. 藉由設定，您可以控制使用者變更其密碼後看到的第一頁。By setting the , you can control the first page that users see after changing their password. 如果屬性是預設值， 欄位中，當使用者按一下 繼續 按鈕、 在重新整理頁面並清除表單上的任何值。If the property is the default, an field, when the user clicks the Continue button, the page is refreshed and any values on the form are cleared. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 取得使用者的目前密碼。

span.span: Gets the current password for the user.

value.span: 使用者輸入的目前密碼。

span.span: The current password entered by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含目前使用者所輸入的密碼。The property contains the current password entered by the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 透過 HTTP 傳輸密碼是潛在的安全性威脅。Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat. HTTP 傳輸可以是檢視或遭惡意使用者。HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users. 為了提高安全性，使用登入控制項時，您應該使用 HTTPS 通訊協定使用安全通訊端層 (SSL) 加密，確保在回傳期間，無法讀取使用者的密碼。To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護登入控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁，會使用控制項，並包含的處理常式事件，名為`ChangingPassword`。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. 中的程式碼`ChangingPassword`處理常式會比較儲存在舊密碼屬性，以新的密碼儲存在。The code in the `ChangingPassword` handler compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果兩個密碼都相同，變更密碼 」 就會失敗。If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails. 控制集屬性設`true`若要讓使用者輸入其使用者名稱。The control sets the property to `true` to enable users to enter their user name. 這表示使用者沒有檢視該頁面登入。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 在程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知其名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作簡單的表單驗證](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要變更其密碼，使用者必須經過驗證的成員資格提供者。In order to change their password, users must be authenticated by the membership provider. 若要允許不登入來變更其密碼，或是由不同的使用者帳戶的成員資格提供者進行驗證，並變更該帳戶，密碼的使用者控制項可以顯示接受的控制項使用者名稱。To allow users who are not logged on to change their password, or to be authenticated by the membership provider with a different user account and then change the password for that account, the control can display a control to accept the user name. 您必須設定屬性，以`true`如果控制項將會顯示不登入的使用者; 否則使用者無法指定使用者名稱。You must set the property to `true` if the control will be displayed to users who are not logged on; otherwise, the user will not be able to specify a user name. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性來顯示控制項不登入網站的使用者。The following code example shows how to set the property to display the control to users who are not logged on to the Web site. [!code-aspx-csharp[ChangePasswordDisplayUserName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordDisplayUserName/CS/changepassworddisplayusernamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ChangePasswordDisplayUserName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordDisplayUserName/VB/changepassworddisplayusernamevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁，會使用控制項，並包含的處理常式事件，名為`ChangingPassword`。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. 中的程式碼`ChangingPassword`處理常式會比較儲存在舊密碼屬性，以新的密碼儲存在。The code in the `ChangingPassword` handler compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果兩個密碼都相同，變更密碼 」 就會失敗。If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails. 控制集屬性設`true`，讓使用者輸入其使用者名稱。The control sets the property to `true` to enable the user to enter their user name. 這表示使用者沒有檢視該頁面登入。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 在程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知其名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作簡單的表單驗證](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A object that contains the properties that define the appearance of error messages on the control.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定屬性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|會出現錯誤訊息文字的背景色彩。The color that appears behind the error message text. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|錯誤訊息文字周圍的框線色彩。The color of the border around the error message text. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|錯誤訊息文字周圍的框線樣式。The style of the border around the error message text. 樣式可`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 預設值為 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`值大於 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|錯誤訊息文字周圍的框線寬度。The width of the border around the error message text.| |`CssClass`|用來呈現錯誤訊息文字階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the error message text. 如果未指定其他設定，它們會覆寫樣式表設定。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗體顯示的錯誤訊息文字。`true` to display the error message text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜體字型顯示的錯誤訊息文字。`true` to display the error message text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字型名稱。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要顯示錯誤訊息文字上方有線條。`true` to display the error message text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|錯誤訊息中的文字大小物件。The size of the text in the error message as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要線顯示錯誤訊息文字。`true` to display the error message text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要顯示錯誤訊息文字與底線。`true` to display the error message text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|錯誤訊息文字中的文字色彩。The color of the text in the error message text. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|A表示錯誤訊息文字的高度。A that represents the height of the error message text.| |`Width`|A表示錯誤訊息文字的寬度。A that represents the width of the error message text.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性取得或設定資訊的文字出現在控制項。The property gets or sets informational text that appears on the control. 預設值為 。The default is . 您可以使用這個屬性來顯示控制項的一般資訊。Use this property to display general information about your control. 您也可以使用屬性來顯示在成員資格提供者中或在指定的密碼需求的相關指示屬性。You can also use the property to display instructions about password requirements specified in the membership provider or in the property. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定屬性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|指示文字的背景色彩。The color behind the instructional text. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|說明文字周圍的框線色彩。The color of the border around the instructional text. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|說明文字周圍的框線樣式。The style of the border around the instructional text. 樣式可`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 預設值為 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`值大於 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|說明文字周圍的框線寬度。The width of the border around the instructional text.| |`CssClass`|用來呈現的指示文字，階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the instructional text. 如果未指定其他設定，它們會覆寫樣式表設定。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗體顯示的指示文字。`true` to display the instructional text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜體字型顯示的指示文字。`true` to display the instructional text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字型名稱。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要顯示的指示文字，其上方有線條。`true` to display the instructional text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|中的指示文字，做為文字的大小物件。The size of the text in the instructional text as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要線顯示的指示文字。`true` to display the instructional text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要顯示的指示文字，與底線。`true` to display the instructional text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|中的指示文字的文字色彩。The color of the text in the instructional text. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|A表示指示文字的高度。A that represents the height of the instructional text.| |`Width`|A表示指示文字的寬度。A that represents the width of the instructional text.|

summary.span: 取得屬性集合的參考，其定義在使用者變更其密碼後，傳送給使用者的電子郵件訊息。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the email message that is sent to users after they have changed their password.

value.span: 參考物件，定義電子郵件訊息傳送至新的使用者。

span.span: A reference to a object that defines the email message sent to a new user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回一組您用來定義格式的屬性和變更其密碼後，傳送給使用者的電子郵件訊息的內容的參考。The property returns a reference to a group of properties that you use to define the format and content of the email message sent to users after they have changed their password. 一般設定包括的主旨與寄件者的回覆地址。Common settings include the subject line and the sender's return address. 如需完整的屬性清單，請參閱 。For a complete list of properties, see . 屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以在這裡設定的屬性物件傳回。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 您可以設定這些屬性形式*屬性*`-`*子屬性*，其中*子屬性*代表之屬性的類別 （適用於範例中， `MailDefinition-Subject`)。You can set these properties in the form *property*`-`*subproperty*, where *subproperty* represents a property of the class (for example, `MailDefinition-Subject`). 您也可以設定屬性以程式設計方式在表單*屬性*`.`*子屬性*(比方說，`MailDefinition.Subject`)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form *Property*`.`*Subproperty* (for example,`MailDefinition.Subject`). 只有當使用者已註冊的成員資格提供者的電子郵件地址傳送電子郵件訊息，才屬性屬性會指向有效的檔案。An email message is sent only if the user has an email address registered with the membership provider and if the property of the property points to a valid file. 如果設定屬性，則屬性必須設為電子郵件地址; 否則擲回例外狀況。If the property is set, the property must be set to an email address; otherwise, an exception is thrown. 如果電子郵件訊息從建立物件，它會使下表所示的替代項目。If the email message is created from the object, it will make the substitutions shown in the following table. 替代文字不區分大小寫。The substitution text is case-insensitive. |替代文字Substitution text|取代為Replaced with| |-----------------------|-------------------| |**<%** `UserName` **%>****<%** `UserName` **%>**|網站使用者的使用者名稱。The Web site user name of the user.| |**\<%** *Password* **%>****\<%** *Password* **%>**|使用者的新密碼。The new password for the user.| 如果的屬性物件`true`，郵件訊息的內容會經過 HTML 編碼，以防範跨網站指令碼的安全性漏洞，訊息收件者。If the property of the object is `true`, the contents of the mail message will be HTML-encoded to guard against cross-site scripting security vulnerabilities for the message recipient. 您可以使用事件，以修改所建立的物件物件。You can use the event to modify the object that is created by the object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可由 「 探查 」 應用程式的特殊網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，使用 緩和措施中所述[保護登入控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來定義電子郵件訊息傳送給變更其密碼的使用者。The following code example shows how to use the property to define an email message that is sent to users who change their passwords. 它會假設有一個稱為檔案`MailFile.txt`，其中包含要傳送的電子郵件訊息的文字。It assumes that there is a file called `MailFile.txt` that contains the text of the email message to send. 要能夠傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者，您必須設定電子郵件伺服器的 Web.config 檔案中適用於您的應用程式。To be able to send email messages to users, you must configure an email server in the Web.config file for your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 如何： 安裝和設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For more information, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). [!code-aspx-csharp[ChangePasswordMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordMailDefinition/CS/changepasswordmaildefinitioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ChangePasswordMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordMailDefinition/VB/changepasswordmaildefinitionvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得或設定用來查閱 成員資訊的成員資格提供者。The property gets or sets the membership provider that is used to look up member information. 如果屬性是`null`或空的預設成員資格提供者， `AspNetSqlMembershipProvider`，會使用。If the property is `null` or empty, the default membership provider, `AspNetSqlMembershipProvider`, is used. 如需有關用於 ASP.NET 應用程式的成員資格提供者的詳細資訊，請參閱[成員資格提供者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f)。For more information about the membership providers available to ASP.NET applications, see [Membership Providers](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f). 新密碼必須符合成員資格提供者所設定的最低需求， ，和屬性。The new password must meet the minimum requirements set by the membership provider in the , , and properties. 如果密碼不符合這些需求，就會引發事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 取得使用者輸入的新密碼。

span.span: Gets the new password entered by the user.

value.span: 使用者輸入的新密碼。

span.span: The new password entered by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含使用者所輸入的新密碼。The property contains the new password entered by the user. 您可以使用屬性來定義新的密碼的需求。You can use the property to define the requirements for the new password. 這個規則運算式用來強制執行用戶端上的密碼規則。This regular expression is used to enforce password rules on the client side. 密碼強制執行可設定資料存放區層級無關。The is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level. 密碼必須符合所設定的最低需求中， ，和屬性。The password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密碼不符合這些需求，就會引發事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. > [!IMPORTANT] > 透過 HTTP 傳輸密碼是潛在的安全性威脅。Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat. HTTP 傳輸可以是檢視或遭惡意使用者。HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users. 為了提高安全性，使用登入控制項時，您應該使用 HTTPS 通訊協定使用安全通訊端層 (SSL) 加密，確保在回傳期間，無法讀取使用者的密碼。To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護登入控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁，會使用控制項，並包含的處理常式事件，名為`ChangingPassword`。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. `ChangingPassword` 比較舊的密碼儲存於屬性，以新的密碼儲存在。`ChangingPassword` compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果它們是一樣，變更密碼 」 就會失敗。If they are the same, changing the password fails. 控制集屬性設`true`，讓使用者輸入其使用者名稱。The control sets the property to `true` to enable the user to enter their user name. 這表示使用者沒有檢視該頁面登入。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 在程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知其名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作簡單的表單驗證](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定用來驗證使用者提供之密碼的規則運算式。

span.span: Gets or sets the regular expression that is used to validate the password provided by the user.

value.span: 用來驗證使用者提供之新密碼的規則運算式字串。

span.span: The regular expression string used to validate the new password provided by the user.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義用來驗證您的網站上的使用者帳戶的密碼需求。Use the property to define the requirements for passwords that are used to validate user accounts on your Web site. 這個規則運算式用來強制執行用戶端上的密碼規則。This regular expression is used to enforce password rules on the client side. 密碼強制執行可設定資料存放區層級無關。The is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level. 密碼必須符合所設定的最低需求中， ，和屬性。The password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密碼不符合這些需求，就會引發事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. 若要顯示給使用者的需求，請設定屬性。To display requirements to the user, set the property. 如果輸入的密碼未通過中包含的規則運算式屬性，而中所包含的文字屬性會顯示給使用者。If the password entered does not pass the regular expression contained in the property, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果密碼遭到拒絕成員資格提供者，文字就會包含在屬性會顯示。If the password is rejected by the membership provider, the text contained in the property is displayed. 密碼標準的常見用法是強制使用者選取強式密碼。A common use of password standards is to force users to select strong passwords. 最佳做法，強制執行密碼規則中的成員資格提供者的資料層級。As a best practice, enforce password rules at the data level in the membership provider. 屬性是用來檢查用戶端上的密碼的方便，但不是鎖定提出重複的使用者嘗試登入。The property allows for the convenience of checking the password on the client side, but does not lock out users who make repeated attempts to log on. 若要提高安全性，設定您的成員資格提供者，以限制使用者得登入的嘗試次數。To improve security, configure your membership provider to restrict the number of attempts a user may make to log on. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護的成員資格](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。For more information, see [Securing Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性來定義規則運算式會檢查密碼，以確保它們符合下列準則：The following code example shows how to set the property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria: - 已超過六個字元。Are greater than six characters. - 包含至少一個數字。Contain at least one digit. - 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 中所包含的密碼需求屬性會顯示給使用者。The password requirements contained in the property are displayed to the user. 如果使用者輸入的密碼不符合準則，文字就會包含在屬性會顯示給使用者。If the password entered by the user does not meet the criteria, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果未輸入新密碼，文字就會包含在屬性會顯示給使用者。If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. > [!NOTE] > 新的密碼也必須符合所設定的最低需求中， ，和屬性。The new password must also meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密碼不符合這些需求，就會引發事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. [!code-aspx-csharp[ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex/CS/changepasswordpasswordregexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex/VB/changepasswordpasswordregexvb.aspx#1)]

returns.span: 如果事件已取消，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項包含子控制項的 [變更密碼] 和 [成功] 檢視。The control contains child controls for the Change Password and Success views. 而不是個別引發事件的每個按鈕，從巢狀控制項的事件會反昇 （也就是它們傳送至命名容器）。Rather than each button raising an event individually, events from the nested controls are bubbled (that is, they are sent to the naming container). 命名容器引發泛用事件稱為`ItemCommand`使用的參數值可讓您判斷哪一個個別控制項引發了原始的事件。The naming container in turn raises a generic event called `ItemCommand` with parameter values that allow you to determine which individual control raised the original event. 回應這個單一事件，您就可以避免撰寫個別的子控制項的事件處理方法。By responding to this single event, you can avoid writing event-handling methods for individual child controls.

span.span: Raises the event after the password is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫中指定的成員資格提供者會變更密碼之後屬性。The method is called after the password is changed by the membership provider specified in the property. 之後呼叫方法時，會發生下列情況：After the method is called, the following occurs: - 如果屬性設定，控制項嘗試傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者。If the property is set, the control attempts to send an email message to the user. - 使用者可以導向至指定的網站屬性或 [控制項] 範本中指定屬性會顯示。The user is either redirected to the Web site specified in the property or the control template specified in the property is displayed. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁中的伺服器事件處理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫方法在衍生類別中，務必呼叫方法的基底類別，好讓註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中指定的成員資格提供者之前呼叫屬性稱為變更使用者的密碼。The method is called before the membership provider specified in the property is called to change the user's password. 使用方法執行之前變更密碼，例如檢查新的密碼，以確保其所需的任何處理不在清單中的一般密碼。Use the method to perform any processing that is necessary before changing the password, such as checking the new password to make sure it is not in a list of common passwords. 方法可以取消藉由設定事件屬性物件當做*e*參數`true`。The method can cancel the event by setting the property of the object passed as the *e* parameter to `true`. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁中的伺服器事件處理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁，會使用控制項，並包含的處理常式事件，名為`ChangingPassword`。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. `ChangingPassword` 比較舊的密碼儲存於屬性，以新的密碼儲存在。`ChangingPassword` compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果兩個密碼都相同，變更密碼 」 就會失敗。If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails. 控制集屬性設`true`，讓使用者輸入其使用者名稱。The control sets the property to `true` to enable the user to enter their user name. 這表示使用者沒有檢視該頁面登入。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 在程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知其名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作簡單的表單驗證](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 伺服器控制項應該執行任何初始設定步驟，建立並設定執行個體所需。Web server controls should perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 您無法使用此事件; 內的檢視狀態資訊它不是尚未填入。You cannot use view state information within this event; it is not populated yet. 您不應該存取期間的另一部 Web 伺服器控制項方法，無論它是子系或父系控制項。You should not access another Web server control during the method, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to the control. 其他 Web 伺服器控制項不一定是已建立並準備好進行存取。Other Web server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access.

summary.span: 然後 SMTP 伺服器會將電子郵件訊息傳送給使用者。

span.span: The SMTP server then sends the email message to the user.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用方法來修改他們變更密碼之後，會傳送給使用者的電子郵件訊息。Use the method to modify the email message that is sent to users after they change their password. 屬性物件將會傳送到 SMTP 伺服器進行處理。The property of the object will be sent to the SMTP server for processing. 修改的內容修改電子郵件訊息的物件。Modify the properties of the object to modify the email message. 電子郵件訊息建立時，才的屬性所指定的物件屬性會指向有效的檔案名稱。Email messages are created only when the property of the object specified by the property points to a valid file name. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可由 「 探查 」 應用程式的特殊網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，使用 緩和措施中所述[保護登入控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁中的伺服器事件處理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁Web 控制項，並包含的事件處理常式事件，名為`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 在程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知其名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作簡單的表單驗證](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密碼變更成功，程式碼會嘗試使用 SMTP 來傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者，以確認變更。If the password change succeeds, the code attempts to use SMTP to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 這在完成`SendingMail`事件處理常式。This is done in the`SendingMail` event handler. 如需有關如何設定 SMTP 伺服器的資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 如何： 安裝和設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 基於此範例的目的，它不需要設定 SMTP 伺服器;範例會建構要傳送電子郵件訊息的失敗測試。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果未正確設定郵件伺服器或其他某些錯誤，就會發生，而且無法傳送電子郵件訊息，`SendMailError`呼叫函式。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 訊息會顯示給使用者。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假設事件來源名為 MySamplesSite 已經存在於 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔記錄事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 請參閱程式碼範例來建立指定的事件來源。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 如需建立事件來源的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁中的伺服器事件處理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的屬性物件設定為`true`表示已處理錯誤。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果您要以程式設計方式加入事件來源名 MySamplesSite 為您的應用程式記錄檔，請使用下列程式碼範例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件來源必須存在於第一個程式碼範例才能正確運作的順序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下列程式碼範例需要系統管理員權限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下列範例程式碼可用來當做 ChangePasswordMail.htm 檔案，如先前的範例程式碼。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the previous example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可由 「 探查 」 應用程式的特殊網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，使用 緩和措施中所述[保護登入控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

Your password for the account named "<%Username%>" has changed.

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

Please read our attached Privacy Notice.

```

summary.span: 當電子郵件訊息無法傳送給使用者時，引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event when an email message cannot be sent to the user.

remarks.format:
## Remarks SMTP 郵件系統會引發例外狀況，正在嘗試將使用者變更密碼後，傳送電子郵件訊息時，會呼叫方法。The method is called when the SMTP mail system raises an exception while attempting to send an email message after a user has changed a password. 檢查的屬性物件傳遞為`e`參數，來判斷實際造成此例外狀況。Examine the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to determine the actual cause of the exception. 最常見的原因是在設定錯誤`smtp`Web.config 檔案區段。The most common reason is a configuration error in the `smtp` section of the Web.config file. 您必須設定物件的屬性當做`e`參數來`true`發出信號，例外狀況已經過處置，否則會重新擲回例外狀況。You must set the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to `true` to signal that the exception has been taken care of; otherwise, the exception is thrown again. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁中的伺服器事件處理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁Web 控制項，並包含的事件處理常式事件，名為`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 在程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知其名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作簡單的表單驗證](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密碼變更成功，程式碼會嘗試使用 SMTP 來傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者，以確認變更。If the password change succeeds, the code attempts to use SMTP to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 這在完成`SendingMail`事件處理常式。This is done in the`SendingMail` event handler. 如需有關如何設定 SMTP 伺服器的資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 如何： 安裝和設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 基於此範例的目的，它不需要設定 SMTP 伺服器;範例會建構要傳送電子郵件訊息的失敗測試。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果未正確設定郵件伺服器或其他某些錯誤，就會發生，而且無法傳送電子郵件訊息，`SendMailError`呼叫函式。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 訊息會顯示給使用者。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假設事件來源名為 MySamplesSite 已經存在於 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔記錄事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 請參閱程式碼範例來建立指定的事件來源。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 如需建立事件來源的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁中的伺服器事件處理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的屬性物件設定為`true`表示已處理錯誤。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果您要以程式設計方式加入事件來源名 MySamplesSite 為您的應用程式記錄檔，請使用下列程式碼範例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件來源必須存在於第一個程式碼範例才能正確運作的順序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下列程式碼範例需要系統管理員權限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下列範例程式碼可用來當做 ChangePasswordMail.htm 檔案，如先前的範例程式碼。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the previous example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可由 「 探查 」 應用程式的特殊網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，使用 緩和措施中所述[保護登入控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

Your password for the account named "<%Username%>" has changed.

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

Please read our attached Privacy Notice.

```
