span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of hint text that appears on the control.

value.span: 物件，包含 屬性，此屬性定義包含在 屬性中提示文字的外觀。

span.span: A object that contains the properties that define the appearance of the text contained in the property.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定屬性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|提示文字的背景色彩。The color behind the hint text. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|提示文字周圍的框線色彩。The color of the border around the hint text. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|提示文字周圍的框線樣式。The style of the border around the hint text. 樣式可以是"None"、 「 點 」、 「 虛線 」、 「 穩固 」、"Double"、"Groove"、"Ridge"、"內凹 」 或 「 開始 」。The style can be "None", "Dotted", "Dashed", "Solid", "Double", "Groove", "Ridge", "Inset", or "Outset". 預設值為"NotSet"。The default is "NotSet". 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`值大於 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|提示文字周圍的框線寬度。The width of the border around the hint text.| |`CssClass`|用來呈現的提示文字階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the hint text. 如果未指定其他設定，它們會覆寫樣式表設定。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗體顯示的提示文字。`true` to display the hint text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜體字型顯示的提示文字。`true` to display the hint text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字型名稱。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要顯示它的上一行的提示文字。`true` to display the hint text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|形式的提示文字中的文字大小物件。The size of the text in the hint text as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要線顯示提示文字。`true` to display the hint text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要顯示提示文字與底線。`true` to display the hint text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|提示文字的文字色彩。The color of the text in the hint text. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|A表示提示文字的高度。A that represents the height of the hint text.| |`Width`|A表示提示文字的寬度。A that represents the width of the hint text.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性取得或設定建立網站密碼需求的相關資訊的文字。The property gets or sets informational text about the requirements for creating a password for the Web site. 使用這個屬性來描述中指定的新密碼的需求屬性。Use this property to describe the requirements for the new password that are specified in the property. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性來定義規則運算式會檢查密碼，以確保它們符合下列準則：The following code example shows how to set the property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria: - 已超過六個字元。Are greater than six characters. - 包含至少一個數字。Contain at least one digit. - 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 中所包含的密碼需求屬性會顯示給使用者。The password requirements contained in the property are displayed to the user. 如果使用者輸入的密碼不符合準則，文字就會包含在屬性會顯示給使用者。If the password entered by the user does not meet the criteria, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果未輸入新密碼，文字就會包含在屬性會顯示給使用者。If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. > [!NOTE] > 新的密碼也必須符合所設定的最低需求中， ，和屬性。The new password must also meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密碼不符合這些需求，就會引發事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. [!code-aspx-csharp[ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex/CS/changepasswordpasswordregexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex/VB/changepasswordpasswordregexvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了讓內嵌樣式屬性，例如套用至所有呈現給控制項的 HTML、 ASP.NET 含括在轉譯的 HTML`table`項目。In order to make inline style properties such as apply to all the HTML that is rendered for the control, ASP.NET encloses the rendered HTML in a `table` element. 如果您不想外部`table`要呈現的項目會將此屬性設定為`false`。If you do not want the outer `table` element to be rendered, set this property to `false`. 在此情況下，如果您嘗試設定內嵌樣式屬性套用至整個控制項時，就會擲回例外狀況。In that case, if you try to set inline style properties that apply to the whole control, an exception is thrown.

returns.span: 伺服器控制項的目前狀態，否則為 。

span.span: The server control's current state; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來儲存狀態資訊的作業所需的控制項。Use the method to save state information required for the operation of the control. 此控制項狀態資料分開儲存的檢視狀態資料控制項。This control state data is stored separately from the view state data for the control. 使用控制項狀態的自訂控制項必須呼叫方法之前儲存控制項狀態的物件。Custom controls using control state must call the method on the object before saving control state.

para.span: 字串物件儲存控制狀態時，會傳回給用戶端會儲存在 HTML 中的變數<type ="hidden"/>項目。

span.span: When control state is saved, a string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML <input type="hidden" /> element.

para.span: 覆寫方法來擷取使用中的狀態資訊控制項。

span.span: Override the method to extract the state information to use in the control.

para.span: 控制項狀態適用於少量的重要資料，例如頁面索引或關鍵字。

span.span: Control state is intended for small amounts of critical data, such as a page index or a keyword.

para.span: 用於大量資料的控制項狀態，可能會影響頁面的效能。

span.span: Using control state for large amounts of data can adversely affect page performance.

summary.span: 儲存從網頁回傳到伺服器起，發生的任何伺服器控制項檢視狀態變更。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視狀態是屬性的值的累積控制項。View state is the accumulation of the values of the properties for the control. 這些值會自動放入屬性控制項，也就是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the property for the control, which is an instance of the class. 值屬性會接著保存到字串物件的儲存狀態的階段之後控制項生命週期。The value for the property is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the control life cycle. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 網頁生命週期概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991). 儲存檢視狀態時，此字串物件會傳回給用戶端做此變數會儲存在 HTML``項目。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `` element. 當您撰寫自訂伺服器控制項時，您可以藉由覆寫來改善效率方法，並修改屬性控制項。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the method and modifying the property for the control.

summary.span: 發生於傳送給使用者確認密碼變更的電子郵件之前。

span.span: Occurs before the user is sent an email confirmation that the password has been changed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 控制項會傳送電子郵件訊息，確認該密碼已變更時屬性會定義要傳送的電子郵件訊息。The control will send an email message confirming that the password has been changed when the property defines an email message to send. 電子郵件訊息包含自動取代欄位的使用者名稱和密碼。The email message contains automatic replacement fields for the user name and password. 您可以使用修改電子郵件訊息傳送給使用者之前的事件。You can use the event to modify the email message before it is sent to the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可由 「 探查 」 應用程式的特殊網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，使用 緩和措施中所述[保護登入控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁Web 控制項，並包含的事件處理常式事件，名為`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 在程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知其名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作簡單的表單驗證](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密碼變更成功，程式碼會嘗試使用 SMTP 來傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者，以確認變更。If the password change succeeds, the code attempts to use SMTP to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 這在完成`SendingMail`事件處理常式。This is done in the`SendingMail` event handler. 如需有關如何設定 SMTP 伺服器的資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 如何： 安裝和設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 基於此範例的目的，它不需要設定 SMTP 伺服器;範例會建構要傳送電子郵件訊息的失敗測試。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果未正確設定郵件伺服器或其他某些錯誤，就會發生，而且無法傳送電子郵件訊息，`SendMailError`呼叫函式。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 訊息會顯示給使用者。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假設事件來源名為 MySamplesSite 已經存在於 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔記錄事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 請參閱程式碼範例來建立指定的事件來源。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 如需建立事件來源的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁中的伺服器事件處理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的屬性物件設定為`true`表示已處理錯誤。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果您要以程式設計方式加入事件來源名 MySamplesSite 為您的應用程式記錄檔，請使用下列程式碼範例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件來源必須存在於第一個程式碼範例才能正確運作的順序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下列程式碼範例需要系統管理員權限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下列範例程式碼可用來當做 ChangePasswordMail.htm 檔案，如先前的範例程式碼。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the previous example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可由 「 探查 」 應用程式的特殊網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，使用 緩和措施中所述[保護登入控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

Your password for the account named "<%Username%>" has changed.

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

Please read our attached Privacy Notice.

```

summary.span: 發生於傳送電子郵件給使用者出現 SMTP 錯誤時。

span.span: Occurs when there is an SMTP error sending an email message to the user.

remarks.format:
## Remarks SMTP 電子郵件提供者在嘗試傳送電子郵件之後使用者已變更其密碼, 時，會擲回例外狀況時引發事件。The event is raised when the SMTP mail provider throws an exception when trying to send an email message after users have changed their password. 會引發這個事件的最常見原因是`smtp`Web.config 檔案區段不正確。The most common reason that this event is raised is that the `smtp` section of the Web.config file is incorrect. 如需詳細資訊`smtp`區段中，請參閱 < [ \ 項目 （網路設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md)。For more information about the `smtp` section, see [\ Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md). 預設值事件處理常式不會攔截或處理的郵件系統的 SMTP 錯誤。The default event handler does not catch or handle the SMTP error from the mail system. 您事件處理常式必須設定屬性物件`true`若要停止正在向使用者顯示的錯誤。Your event handler must set the property of the object to `true` in order to stop the error from being displayed to users. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁Web 控制項，並包含的事件處理常式事件，名為`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 在程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知其名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作簡單的表單驗證](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密碼變更成功，程式碼會嘗試使用 SMTP 來傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者，以確認變更。If the password change succeeds, the code attempts to use SMTP to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 這在完成`SendingMail`事件處理常式。This is done in the`SendingMail` event handler. 如需有關如何設定 SMTP 伺服器的資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 如何： 安裝和設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 基於此範例的目的，它不需要設定 SMTP 伺服器;範例會建構要傳送電子郵件訊息的失敗測試。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果未正確設定郵件伺服器或其他某些錯誤，就會發生，而且無法傳送電子郵件訊息，`SendMailError`呼叫函式。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 訊息會顯示給使用者。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假設事件來源名為 MySamplesSite 已經存在於 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔記錄事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 請參閱程式碼範例來建立指定的事件來源。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 如需建立事件來源的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁中的伺服器事件處理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的屬性物件設定為`true`表示已處理錯誤。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果您要以程式設計方式加入事件來源名 MySamplesSite 為您的應用程式記錄檔，請使用下列程式碼範例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件來源必須存在於第一個程式碼範例才能正確運作的順序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下列程式碼範例需要系統管理員權限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下列範例程式碼可用來當做 ChangePasswordMail.htm 檔案，如先前的範例程式碼。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the previous example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可由 「 探查 」 應用程式的特殊網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，使用 緩和措施中所述[保護登入控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

Your password for the account named "<%Username%>" has changed.

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

Please read our attached Privacy Notice.

```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性，如果您要重新導向至您網站上的特定頁面之後已成功變更其密碼的使用者。Set the property when you want users to be redirected to a specific page of your Web site after successfully changing their passwords. 如果屬性未設定 （設定為預設值），頁面包含控制重新整理和屬性會顯示。If the property is not set (set is the default), the page containing the control is refreshed and the property is displayed. 如果屬性設定，不會顯示 [成功] 檢視。If the property is set, the Success view is not displayed. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定物件，可由控制項。The property specifies the object that is used by the control. 屬性時，可存取只使用程式碼後置檔案。The property is accessible only when using a code-behind file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [How To： 建立 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項範本動態](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4)。For more information, see [How To: Create ASP.NET Web Server Control Templates Dynamically](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4). 範本是一份 HTML 項目和控制項的版面配置控制項的特定部分所組成。A template is a set of HTML elements and controls that make up the layout for a particular portion of a control. 樣板與樣式不同：Templates differ from styles: - 範本會定義控制項的區段的內容。Templates define the content of a section of a control. - 樣式會指定在控制項中項目的外觀。Styles specify the appearance of elements in the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Web 伺服器控制項樣板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae)並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see [Web Server Controls Templates](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae) and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 控制項支援下列的範本會套用到對應的控制項檢視。The control supports the following templates, which are applied to the corresponding control view. |範本名稱Template name|控制項檢視Control view| |-------------------|------------------| ||變更密碼 檢視Change Password view| ||[成功] 檢視Success view| 您也可以建立或修改在.aspx 檔案中的控制項範本。You can also create or modify the template for a control in your .aspx file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建立 ASP.NET Web 控制項範本以宣告方式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4977e1d5-c53a-4908-83be-bba0ad37357a)。For more information, see [How to: Create ASP.NET Web Control Templates Declaratively](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4977e1d5-c53a-4908-83be-bba0ad37357a).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定屬性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|[成功] 檢視文字的背景色彩。The color behind the Success view text. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|[成功] 檢視文字周圍的框線色彩。The color of the border around the Success view text. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|[成功] 檢視文字周圍的框線樣式。The style of the border around the Success view text. 樣式可`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 預設值為 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`值大於 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|[成功] 檢視文字周圍的框線寬度。The width of the border around the Success view text.| |`CssClass`|用來呈現成功 檢視文字階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Success view text. 如果未指定其他設定，它們會覆寫樣式表設定。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗體顯示 [成功] 檢視文字。`true` to display the Success view text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜體字型顯示 [成功] 檢視文字。`true` to display the Success view text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字型名稱。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要顯示 [成功] 檢視文字上方有線條。`true` to display the Success view text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|在 [成功] 檢視文字，做為文字的大小物件。The size of the text in the Success view text as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要線時，顯示 [成功] 檢視文字。`true` to display the Success view text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要顯示 [成功] 檢視文字與底線。`true` to display the Success view text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|在 [成功] 檢視文字的文字色彩。The color of the text in the Success view text. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|A ，代表 [成功] 檢視文字的高度。A that represents the height of the Success view text.| |`Width`|A ，代表 [成功] 檢視文字的寬度。A that represents the width of the Success view text.|

summary.span: 取得定義 控制項上文字方塊外觀之 屬性集合的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of text box controls on the control.

value.span: 物件，定義 控制項上文字方塊控制項的外觀。

span.span: A object that defines the appearance of text box controls on the control.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定屬性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|文字方塊的背景色彩。The background color of text boxes. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|[文字] 方塊周圍的框線色彩。The color of the border around the text boxes. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|[文字] 方塊周圍的框線樣式。The style of the border around the text boxes. 樣式可`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 預設值為 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`值大於 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|[文字] 方塊周圍的框線寬度。The width of the border around the text boxes.| |`CssClass`|用來將文字方塊轉譯階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the text boxes. 如果未指定其他設定，它們會覆寫樣式表設定。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗體顯示文字方塊文字。`true` to display the text boxes text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜體字型顯示文字方塊文字。`true` to display the text boxes text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字型名稱。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要顯示文字的方塊文字上方有線條。`true` to display the text boxes text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|在文字方塊中，做為文字的大小物件。The size of the text in the text boxes as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要線顯示文字方塊文字。`true` to display the text boxes text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要顯示文字的方塊文字與底線。`true` to display the text boxes text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|在文字方塊中的文字色彩。The color of the text in the text boxes. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|A表示文字方塊的高度。A that represents the height of the text boxes.| |`Width`|A表示文字方塊的寬度。A that represents the width of the text boxes.|

summary.span: 取得或設定要變更密碼的網站使用者名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the Web site user name for which to change the password.

value.span: 要變更密碼的使用者名稱。

span.span: The user name for which to change the password.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 屬性會取得網站的使用者名稱，要變更密碼。The property gets the Web site user name for which to change the password. 您也可以使用屬性只是為了取得使用者名稱從控制項，而不需要變更密碼。You can also use the property just to get the user name from within the control, without changing the password. 此外，屬性可用於從已建立以傳送電子郵件的電子郵件訊息控制項使用字串"\<%username%>"的電子郵件訊息主體中。Additionally, the property can be used from within an email message that has been created to send email from the control by using the string "\<%UserName%>" in the body of the email message. 若要允許使用者輸入使用者名稱，請設定屬性設`true`。To allow the user to type in a user name, set the property to `true`. 如果已驗證使用者，他或她不需要輸入使用者名稱。If a user is already authenticated, he or she does not need to enter a user name. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁Web 控制項，並包含的事件處理常式事件，名為`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 在程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知其名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作簡單的表單驗證](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密碼變更成功，程式碼會嘗試使用 SMTP 來傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者，以確認變更。If the password change succeeds, the code attempts to use SMTP to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 這在完成`SendingMail`事件處理常式。This is done in the`SendingMail` event handler. 如需有關如何設定 SMTP 伺服器的資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 如何： 安裝和設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 基於此範例的目的，它不需要設定 SMTP 伺服器;範例會建構要傳送電子郵件訊息的失敗測試。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果未正確設定郵件伺服器或其他某些錯誤，就會發生，而且無法傳送電子郵件訊息，`SendMailError`呼叫函式。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 訊息會顯示給使用者。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假設事件來源名為 MySamplesSite 已經存在於 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔記錄事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 請參閱程式碼範例來建立指定的事件來源。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 如需建立事件來源的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁中的伺服器事件處理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的屬性物件設定為`true`表示已處理錯誤。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果您要以程式設計方式加入事件來源名 MySamplesSite 為您的應用程式記錄檔，請使用下列程式碼範例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件來源必須存在於第一個程式碼範例才能正確運作的順序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下列程式碼範例需要系統管理員權限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下列範例程式碼可用來當做 ChangePasswordMail.htm 檔案，如先前的範例程式碼。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the previous example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可由 「 探查 」 應用程式的特殊網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，使用 緩和措施中所述[保護登入控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

Your password for the account named "<%Username%>" has changed.

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

Please read our attached Privacy Notice.

```

summary.span: 取得定義錯誤訊息外觀的 屬性集合參考，該錯誤訊息與 控制項使用的任何輸入驗證相關聯。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of error messages that are associated with any input validation used by the control.

value.span: 物件，定義錯誤訊息的外觀，其與 控制項使用之任何輸入驗證相關聯。

span.span: A object that defines the appearance of error messages that are associated with any input validation used by the control.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定屬性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|錯誤訊息的背景色彩。The color behind the error messages. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|錯誤訊息周圍的框線色彩。The color of the border around the error messages. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|錯誤訊息周圍的框線樣式。The style of the border around the error messages. 樣式可以是"None"、 「 點 」、 「 虛線 」、 「 穩固 」、"Double"、"Groove"、"Ridge"、"內凹 」 或 「 開始 」。The style can be "None", "Dotted", "Dashed", "Solid", "Double", "Groove", "Ridge", "Inset", or "Outset". 預設值為"NotSet"。The default is "NotSet". 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`值大於 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|錯誤訊息周圍的框線寬度。The width of the border around the error messages.| |`CssClass`|用來呈現的錯誤訊息階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the error messages. 如果未指定其他設定，它們會覆寫樣式表設定。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗體顯示的錯誤訊息文字。`true` to display the error messages text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜體字型顯示的錯誤訊息文字。`true` to display the error messages text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字型名稱。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要顯示錯誤訊息文字上方有線條。`true` to display the error messages text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|錯誤訊息中的文字大小物件。The size of the text in the error messages as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 線，以顯示錯誤訊息文字。`true` to display the error messages text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要顯示錯誤訊息文字與底線。`true` to display the error messages text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|中的錯誤訊息文字的色彩。The color of the text in the error messages. 色彩可以是任一屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|A表示錯誤訊息的高度。A that represents the height of the error messages.| |`Width`|A表示錯誤訊息的寬度。A that represents the width of the error messages.|
